content: Steve McGrath — who is posted below — spent the last 8 years calling Michelle Obama a gorilla and an ape and making fun of her Old Navy clothing, and now he is just aghast that anyone would dare to question Melania’s motives. Yes, Steve — indeed. You, yourself, and only you, know the true motives of the gorilla wife and of sweet pure Melania. How beautiful it must to be someone as prescient as you …
